name: Virtual Guy's Adventure
description:
A fun 2D Jump n Run game I made with the tutorial from: YT(@codinginflow)! The assets are from the Unity Assets Store and from the Internet. I don't want to make any money with this game it's just made for you to enjoy :). Music from: Minecraft, Star Wars, FNAF, Super Mario Games,

On my Youtube Channel YT(@Tob1m) you can find my Direct Video, in this Video's description you can also find the download links to the game and patch notes!

-

You can find the Patch Notes also in the zip binder!

Patch Notes ENGLISH V.1.5.0: https://www.dropbox.com/s/th0twoj87lu3391/Patch%20Notes%20V.1.5.0%20ENGLISH%20.t...

Patch Notes GERMAN  V.1.5.0: https://www.dropbox.com/s/xjerfov37jelum1/Patch%20Notes%20V.1.5.0%20GERMAN.txt?d...

If the links are not working copy paste them into google!

-

Enjoy the game!
